## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8701925ae3f59cea7bd95b4038929fbb187ce0e0c760b578a243a544ef68cc13)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'package-with-conditions' @ 10.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
